特記事項: 【合併】英語Iｄ　１７（経済学部）/英語IIｂ　１７（経済学部）
授業方法: Class will be face to face style, however, in the case of Corona virus illness, students will have to submit On Demand lessons for the classes they miss.  In this class, students will practice using the target language through a variety of lessons and activities.  Pair and group work will be an integral part of each class.  Situational pair work dialog construction and presentation will also be a fundamental part of the course.

第1回: Welcome back, Summer Holiday group interview chart, short speeches
Review of today's in-class study.  45 minutes of preparation.
第2回: Text Unit 7 "Food"    asking what something means, listening comprehension drills, practice dialogs extended
Food choices:  worksheet homework assignment.  One hour of out of class study.
第3回: Text Unit 8 "Transportation"   asking for and giving directions, listening comprehension drills
Identifying common grammar mistakes.  One hour of study.
第4回: Text Unit 8 "Transportation" continued, explaining commutes, What is the question?  dialog construction
Extending the in-class dialog construction.  One hour or more of out of class study.
第5回: Text Unit 9 "Shopping and Money"   devising your own budget, financial vocabulary terms, dialog practice and extension
Matching:  country and currency, financial terms.  One hour of study.
第6回: Text Unit 9 "Shopping and Money" continued, listening comprehension drills, shops and businesses
Making questions from the in-class listening comprehension drills. One hour or more of study.
第7回: Text Unit 10 "Health"   habits and routines, kinds of stress, pair work questionnaire
Begin outline for presentation.  One hour or more of study.
第8回: Slang and gestures, individual presentations first draft writing
Revision of presentation writing.  One hour or more of study.
第9回: Individual presentations and feedback, corrective criticism, cultural misunderstandings and language use
Presentation result worksheet.  One hour of out of class study.
第10回: Text Unit 11 "People and Countries"  describing people and cultural differences dialog, world map, cultural and geographical questions
Report:  individual countries to be announced.  One hour or more of study.
第11回: Text Unit 11 "People and Countries" continued, What is famous in ...?  pair work dialog construction and presentation
Country and customs worksheet assignment.  One hour of study.
第12回: Text Unit 12 "Take a Trip"   making hotel reservations, confirming flight information, extend the dialogs, listening comprehension drills
Research:  Potential problems when traveling.  One hour of out of class study.
第13回: Group activity interview chart, course review, exam explanation, question and answer session
Preparing questions for the question and answer session.  45 minutes of preparation
トピック.授業外学習2: Students would be advised to do as much personal study outside the classroom as possible.  Also, to submit any homework assignments on time.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【100】英語Iｄ　１７／English Id
担当者: ジェイコブス　Ｊ．（JACOBS JOE M.）
